document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Four </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Trees </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0bcd4">solitary </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Acre </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Without </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Design </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Order, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Apparent </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Action </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Maintain </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#489cff">Morning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">meets </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Wind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">nearer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">Neighbor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">God </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Acre </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gives </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">them </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Place </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Him </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">Attention </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Passer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">by </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Shadow, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Squirrel, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">haply </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a874ff">Boy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Deed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Their's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">unto </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">General </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#649cff">Nature </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">Plan </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">severally </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94b8f8">retard </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">further </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Unknown </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Four trees opon a solitary acre
